alert.note: Alert for Hutchinson; McCook; Turner; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 10:23PM MDT until July 25 at 11:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern McCook County in southeastern South Dakota... Northern Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... Eastern Hutchinson County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1122 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Emery to near Clayton to near Menno, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Menno around 1130 PM CDT. Freeman around 1135 PM CDT. Dolton around 1140 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Marion, Monroe, Parker, Mayfield, Viborg, Irene and Hurley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
